draw2d_hash.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ======================
00003 !
00004 !   DRAW_TREE_2D 
00005 !
00006 !   Output tree structure from hash table for processing
00007 !   by GLE 
00008 !
00009 ! ======================
00010 
00011 subroutine draw2d_hash
00012 
00013 
00014 
00015   !  Tree written to ....  tree.box2dN
00016   !  Particles       ....  tree.partsN
00017   !  Centres         ....  tree.comasN
00018 
00019 
00020   use treevars
00021 
00022   implicit none
00023 
00024   integer*8 :: key_twig(ntwig), key_leaf(nleaf)
00025 
00026   integer, dimension(nppm) :: ix, iy
00027 
00028   integer, dimension(ntwig) :: level_twig, node_twig       ! twig-nodes
00029   integer, dimension(nleaf) :: level_leaf, plist_leaf, ind_leaf       ! leaf-nodes
00030 
00031   character(30) :: cfile
00032   character(1) :: csnap
00033   integer ic(5),jc(5),lc(5)
00034   real octx(9),octy(9)
00035 
00036   integer :: i, ip, j, ilev, isnap, ibt
00037   real :: s, xt, yt
00038 
00039   save isnap
00040   data isnap/1/
00041   !  square data
00042   data ic/0,1,1,0,0/
00043   data jc/0,0,1,1,0/
00044   data lc/1,0,0,0,0/
00045 
00046   csnap=achar(mod(isnap,10)+48)
00047 
00048 
00049   cfile="box2d_"//csnap//".gle"
00050   write (ipefile,'(a)') cfile
00051   open(60,file=cfile)
00052 
00053 
00054   !  initialise graphics filter
00055 
00056   write (60,'(a,2(/a),2(/a,2f13.4))') &
00057        'size 15 15' &
00058        , 'set font psh hei .02' &
00059        , 'set lwidth 0.01' &
00060        , 'begin scale ',12./xl,12./xl &
00061        , 'begin translate ',.01*xl,.01*yl
00062 
00063 
00064   ! get keys of twig nodes from hash table
00065   key_twig = pack(htable%key,mask=htable%node<0)
00066 
00067   ! get levels of twigs
00068   level_twig = log( 1.*key_twig )/log(4.)
00069   node_twig = pack(htable%node,mask=htable%node<0)         ! twig index
00070 
00071 
00072   write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color blue','set lwidth .005'
00073 
00074   do j=1,ntwig
00075      ! get coords from keys
00076      nbits = level_twig(j)
00077      ix(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_twig(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00078      iy(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_twig(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00079 
00080      s = xl/2**(level_twig(j))          !  box length
00081      xt=ix(j)*s
00082      yt=iy(j)*s
00083      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00084      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'box ',s,s
00085      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xcoc( node_twig(j) ),ycoc( node_twig(j) )        ! Centre of charge of twig node
00086      write (60,'(a,f10.5,a)') 'circle ',.005*sqrt(abs_charge( node_twig(j) )),' fill cyan'
00087      !     write (60,'(a)') 'set hei 0.03'
00088      !     write (60,'(a,b10)') 'text ',key_twig(j)         ! write out key
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092   end do
00093 
00094 
00095   ! get keys of twig nodes from hash table
00096   key_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%key,mask=htable%node>0)
00097   ind_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%node,mask=htable%node>0)         ! particle index
00098   plist_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%childcode,mask=htable%node>0)   ! particle label
00099 
00100   ! get levels of twigs
00101   level_leaf(1:nleaf) = log(1.*key_leaf(1:nleaf))/log(4.)
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105   write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color green','set lwidth .002'
00106 
00107   do j=1,nleaf
00108      ! get box coords from keys
00109      nbits = level_leaf(j)    ! # bits per ordinate
00110      ix(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_leaf(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00111      iy(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_leaf(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00112 
00113      s = xl/2**(level_leaf(j))          !  box length
00114      xt=ix(j)*s
00115      yt=iy(j)*s
00116      write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color black','set lwidth .002'
00117      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00118      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'box ',s,s
00119      ! keys
00120      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt+s/4,yt+s/2
00121      !     write (60,'(a)') 'set hei 0.02'
00122      !     write (60,'(a,b10)') 'text ',key_leaf(j)
00123 
00124      ! particle coords derived from leaf data
00125 
00126      !     write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color green','set lwidth .002'
00127      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00128      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'circle .02'
00129 
00130 
00131   end do
00132 
00133   write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color red','set lwidth .002'
00134 
00135 
00136   do i=1,npp
00137      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',x(i),y(i)
00138      if (q(i)<0) then
00139         write (60,'(a)') 'circle .005 fill red'
00140      else
00141         write (60,'(a)') 'circle .005 fill green'
00142      endif
00143 
00144   end do
00145 
00146 
00147 
00148   write (60,'(a/a)') 'end translate','end scale'
00149   close(60)
00150 
00151 
00152   isnap=isnap+1
00153 
00154 end subroutine draw2d_hash
